content.text: Hi there! My name is Alex. I'm a welder.
Hi Alex! I'm Emily. I'm a stay at home mom.
Cool. What are some of your hobbies?
I like to read, play video games, and watch Netflix.
Nice. I like to play video games too. What are some of your favorites?
I love the Legend of Zelda series. I'm also a big fan of Mario and Pokemon.
Those are all great games. I'm a big fan of The Witcher 3.
I've heard good things about that game. I'll have to check it out.
You definitely should. It's one of the best games I've ever played.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go camping and fishing. I also like to play guitar.
I've never been camping, but it looks like fun. I love fishing too.
It's a lot of fun. And you can catch some really delicious fish.
What kind of fish do you like to catch?
I like to catch bass and trout. They're both really good to eat.
I've never had trout before. I'll have to try it sometime.
You definitely should. It's really good.
Well, it was nice talking to you, Alex.
You too, Emily. It was nice talking to you.
